src:
侍ジャパン　４番鈴木が先制の適時三塁打！吉田も適時打で２－０

07 Nov 2019

　「プレミア１２・１次ラウンド、日本－台湾」（７日、台中インターコンチネンタル野球場）
　侍ジャパンが先制に成功した。
　一回、２死から近藤（日本ハム）が四球、暴投で二塁へ進塁。ここで４番・鈴木が左中間への適時三塁打。完全アウェーの敵地で、侍の４番が強烈な先制パンチを浴びせた。さらに２死三塁から吉田（オリックス）も右前適時打。２－０とした。
　ともに２連勝で１次ラウンド突破を決めている両チーム。この試合の勝敗はスーパーラウンドにも持ち越されるため、決勝に向けても大事な一戦となる。
text:
SAMURAI JAPAN 4th Suzuki is timely three strikes ahead of time! Yoshida also hit 2-0 in a timely manner

07 Nov 2019

"Premier 12.1 Round, Japan-Taiwan" (7th, Taichung Intercontinental Baseball Stadium)
侍 Samurai Japan has succeeded in the preemptive.
】 Once, from the second death, Kondo (Nippon Ham) moved on to the second base with a four-ball, throwing. Here, No. 4 Suzuki made a three-time strike to the left middle in a timely manner. In a completely away enemy land, Samurai No. 4 took a strong first strike. Furthermore, Yoshida (ORIX) also hit the right front in a timely manner from the second death and third base. It was set to 2-0.
Both teams have decided to break through the first round with two consecutive wins. Since this game will be carried over to the Super Round, it will be an important game for the final.
